# SALURBAL Data Portal Documentation

### This site documents the SALURBAL portal initiative within the context of FAIR data principles 

- Document and justify new data and codebook standards
- Increase transparency of these standards for future datasets/codebooks
- Provide detailed instructions on how to renovate legacy SALURBAL datasets/codebooks
- FAIR Implementation Profile for WP08
- Report on standardization/database progress
